topic.title: Active Onboard Administrator Virtual Buttons tab
topic.keywords: Onboard Administrator UID toggle Onboard Administrator virtual buttons virtual buttons Onboard Administrator

content.p: Click Reset to reset the Onboard Administrator. A confirmation screen appears, asking if you are sure that you want to perform the action and that you will be signed out and disconnected from the Onboard Administrator. Click OK to proceed, or click Cancel to exit without a change.
Click Toggle On/Off to change the state of the UID Light. This button is useful in identifying a particular Onboard Administrator when there is more than one.
